document_data.name: Precious stones
document_data.mainbody: '''Precious stones''' had a base value of 500 gp once they are cut and polished.
document_data.Notable precious stones:
Some typical precious stones found in the ''Realms'':
* [[Alexandrite]]
* [[Aquamarine]]
* [[Pearl|Black pearl]] (3rd edition)
* [[Euclase]]
* [[Flamedance]]
* [[Garnet (gem)|Garnet]] (rare variety)
* [[Heliodor]]
* [[Horn coral]]
* [[Orbaline]]
* [[Pearl]] (2nd edition)
* [[Peridot]] (2nd edition)
* [[Raindrop]]
* [[Rusteen]]
* [[Sphene]]
* [[Spinel]]
* [[Topaz]]
